EmailTemplate.name: 2019 Dealer Update #20.2019 Dealer Update #20
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletins Update - October 15, 2019
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Sales Bulletins | October 2019
New Sales Bulletins Honeywell is pleased to announce the following bulletins, with more coming in the next few weeks:
- 2020-01 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-01 Rev -_ADS-B Upgrade for Business Aircraft with Primus II RM-855.....pdf]]> ADS-B Upgrade for Business Aircraft with Primus II RM-855
- 2020-02 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-02 Rev -_ADS-B Upgrade for Business Aircraft with Primus II RM-850.....pdf]]> ADS-B Upgrade for Business Aircraft with Primus II RM-850 - 2020-03 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-03 Rev -_CD-830 Control Display Unit for Business Aircraft.pdf]]> CD-830 Control Display Unit for Business Aircraft - 2020-04 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-04 Rev -_Hawker 800 %26 1000 Special Offering FMS 6.1 %26 ADSB.pdf]]> Hawker 800 & 1000 Special Offering for FMS 6.1 and ADS-B - 2020-05 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-05 Rev -_FANS 1A PM-CPDLC Upgrade for Business Aircraft Mk II Plus.....pdf]]> FANS 1/A+ Operation and PM-CPDLC Upgrade for Business Aircraft - 2020-06 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-06 Rev -_PM-CPDLC Upgrade for Business Aircraft Mk III to Mk II Plu....pdf]]> PM-CPDLC Upgrade Mark III to Mark II+ CMU for Business Aircraft - 2020-08 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-08 Rev -_ AFIS DMU Sita Change.pdf]]> AFIS DMU SITA Change - 2019-07 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-07 Rev A_FANS 1 A Upgrade for Business Aircraft.pdf]]> FANS 1/A+ Operation Upgrade for Business Aircraft - 2019-17 Rev B <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-17-Rev-B-Ovation-Select-CS-CMS-MHT-TO-OST-Upgrade-for-Business-Aircraft-Promo-Price-Extended.pdf]]> Ovation Select CS CMS MHT-TO-OST Upgrade for Business Aircraft Promo Price Extended - 2019-18 Rev B <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-18-Rev-B-Ovation-Select-CS-CMS-MHT-TO-OST-Upgrade-for-Falcon-F900-F2000-Promo-Price-Extended.pdf]]> Ovation Select CS CMS MHT TO OST Upgrade for Falcon F900 F2000 Promo Price Extended - 2019-19 Rev B <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-19-Rev-B-Ovation-Select-CS-CMS-MHT-TO-OST-Upgrade-for-Global-Express-Promo-Price-Extended.pdf]]> Ovation Select CS CMS MHT-TO-OST Upgrade for Global Express Promo Price Extended - 2019-33 Rev B <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-33 Rev B_FANS 1A PM-CPDLC Upgrade for Business Aircraft.pdf]]> FANS 1/A+ Operation and PM-CPDLC Upgrade for Business Aircraft. - 2019-35 Rev B <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-35 Rev B_Hawker 800 %26 1000 Special Offering FMS 6-1 ADSB.pdf]]> Hawker 800 & 1000 Special Offering for FMS 6.1 ADS-B
Dealers can find 2019 and 2020 sales bulletins on MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/JI2qQ00VCX0ZNE00G000000]]> under Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
